name: Jelly Rush
description:
A Jelly changes its shape to pass across different Walls and Barriers

Key-A Move Left

Key-D Move Right

Mouse Button Left: Change Shape Tall

Mouse Button Right: Change Shape Fat

Suggestion to play on fullscreen

This game was concepted and created in 5 weeks by a small and dedicated team of student devs at the School of Game Development @ Academy of Art University.
